lead_paragraph: LEVINE--Melvin, on April 18, 2016, of Boynton Beach, FL, formerly of Brooklyn, NY. Beloved husband, father, grandfather and great-grandfather. Esteemed educator and accountant. He will be missed by all those whose lives he touched. 1/3
